The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: JCDecaux Cover letter dated 31 January 2025; Appendix A, Out-of-Home: The Sustainable Public Screen, EDF Certification, Sustainable Design commitment, Shelter Configurations (Mark One A - 4 Bay and 3 Bay), Existing Examples,  TfL London Landmark Shelter Design, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design Elevation Drawings, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design Key Features and Dimensions, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design Eco Friendly Design (x2), TfL London Landmark Shelter Design Monitoring and Remote Control, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design Maintenance, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design LCD Screen Specification, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design LCD Outdoor Screen Attributes, TfL London Landmark Shelter Design With DynaScan Outdoor LCD Screen; Letter of Support - TfL dated 31 january 2025; Shelter Advertising Proposal (0126/0328); and Appendix B

Reason:  In order to facilitate the use of section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to make minor material amendments to this planning permission.
